item.title: Etsy Names Kruti Patel Goyal As Next CEO, Stock Slides On Lower Sales Outlook
item.description: Josh Silverman will remain on board as Executive Chair through December 31, 2026.

item.title: Fubo Stock Gains As Disney Merger Creates Sixth-Largest Pay TV Platform In US
item.description: The combined business will maintain Fubo and Hulu + Live TV as separate services, offering multiple plan tiers and distinct apps.
